charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was heading home
after a hard training session in preparation for the
PML finals, when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard some voices.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1101_0200_2:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] searched for the people behind the
voices, when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found...
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_0300_1:
First, I suppose I should thank you for accepting
this battle.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_0400_1:
I would have preferred to do it during the finals,
but as we both know, that’s not how things
worked out.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_0500_1:
But I will have my rematch! Let’s settle this once
and for all!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1101_0700_2: Hoopa and Charizard began a heated battle.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1000_1: I commend you on your win, Red.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1100_1:
But just because we lost doesn’t mean we haven’t
improved! We almost had you this time!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1200_1:
It’s just a matter of time. Mark my words, we WILL
beat you.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1400_1:
What a strange feeling. I lost, but I feel
somehow...liberated.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1600_1:
Hm? What, you’re feeling down now? That’s not
like you at all!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1700_1:
But I guess if it makes you quiet, I have no
complaints.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1800_1:
H-hey... Come on, this is too much, even for you.
You’re starting to make me feel bad!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_1900_1:
Cheer up! Go back to how you are when you play
tricks on us.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_2200_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?! How long have
you been watching us?
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_0401_2400_1: What?! Then...you saw my match with Red.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_0402_2600_1: Wait, you saw us?! From the very beginning?!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_2700_1:
Tch! No matter. I did nothing that would embarrass
myself anyway.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_0301_2800_1: You get along well with Hoopa.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_0401_2900_1:
Are you kidding? We’ve just known each other for
a long time, that’s all.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_0302_3000_1: You two were really in sync!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_0402_3100_1:
Well, we’ve known each other for a while. I can
pretty much tell what Hoopa’s thinking.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3200_1:
Hey. Why don’t you go play with them, since you
called them here?
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3300_1:
Hoopa’s been like that ever since we met. Always
playing tricks and making things hard on me.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3400_1: But...that also helped me a lot.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3500_1: Especially when I was all alone.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3600_1:
We used to have fun back then, when I think
about it.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3700_1:
Once, he teleported some Exploud when everyone
was asleep, and they made such a huge
ruckus that...
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3800_1: Er... That’s a strange memory, I suppose.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_3900_1: Oh, and there was this other time...
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4000_1:
We were playing, and he teleported some Tauros,
which started to chase after us in a horrible game
of tag...
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4100_1: No! What I want are mischief-free memories!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4200_1:
Well...guess I can’t use that one... Um...
Hmmm...
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4300_1:
Hoopa! All of the memories I have of us together
are of you causing trouble for me!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4400_1: You don’t see me as a prince at all, do you.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4500_1: You know what? I guess that’s fine.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4600_1: It’s time for us to leave. See you around.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4800_1:
Between you and Red, only one of your teams can
become the first champions of the PML.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_4900_1:
As the host of the PML, I expect nothing less than
the finest battle between you two.
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_5400_1:
But it’s different if we’re just talking about
individual sync pairs!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_5500_1:
Whichever one of you wins and becomes
champion is the one I will challenge!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_5600_1:
In the end, my plan is to win and
become the ultimate number one!
charaepi_ch0066_01_boss/2301_1201_5700_1: I look forward to our next match! Hahahahaha!
